app.title: Samvargani
app.description: Samvargani is an interesting game that helps you learn Hindi. It is a great way to improve your Hindi vocabulary and is a must-have app for people interested in learning Hindi.

author.name: Aruhant Mehta
author.bio: Aruhant Mehta is a 17 year old student who is enthusiastic about computer programming and technology. He is currently learning Python and Flutter. He is also a student of the Indian classical dance Kathak.

page1.title: Welcome to Samvargani!
page1.body: Let's learn about this interesting game.

page2.title: In this game, you have to guess a 2-to-5 letter Hindi word in as few tries as possible.
page2.body: After each guess, you will be told which letters in your guess are correct.

page3.title: During the game, you can touch the letters to see this legend.
page3.body:
ðŸŸ¥ The letter is not present in the correct answer.
ðŸŸ© The letter is present in the correct answer at the correct position.
ðŸŸ§ The letter is present in the correct answer but not at the correct position.

cellTooltip.correctWithMatra: This cell contains the letter '{}', with this correct matra.
cellTooltip.correctWithAdha: This cell contains the letter '{}', with this correct half letter.
cellTooltip.correctWithMatraAndAdha: This cell contains the letter '{}', with this correct matra and half letter.
cellTooltip.correctWithoutMatraAndAdha: This cell contains the letter '{}', without any matra or half letter.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithMatra: This cell contains the letter '{}' but not with the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithAdha: This cell contains the letter '{}' but not with the '{}' half letter.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithMatraAndAdha: This cell contains the letter '{}' but not with the '{}' half letter or the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.correctVyanjanWithoutMatraAndAdha: This cell contains the letter '{}' but with a matra or half letter.
cellTooltip.misplacedWithMatra: '{}' is present in the word with this correct matra but not at this position.
cellTooltip.misplacedWithAdha: '{}' is present in the word with this correct half letter but not at this position.
cellTooltip.misplacedWithMatraAndAdha: '{}' is present in the word with this correct matra and half letter but not at this position.
cellTooltip.misplacedWithoutMatraAndAdha: '{}' is present in the word, without any matra or half letter, but not at this position.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithMatra: '{}' is present in the word, but not at this position, and not with this '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithAdha: '{}' is present in the word, but not at this position, and not with this '{}' half letter.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithMatraAndAdha: '{}' is present in the word, but not at this position, and not with this '{}' half letter or this '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.misplacedVyanjanWithoutMatraAndAdha: '{}' is present in the word, but with a matra and/or half letter, and not at this position.
cellTooltip.incorrect: {} is not present in the word in any form.
cellTooltip.emptyWithMatra: This cell contains a letter with the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.emptyWithAdha: This cell contains a letter with the '{}' half letter.
cellTooltip.emptyWithMatraAndAdha: This cell contains a letter with the '{}' half letter and the '{}' matra.
cellTooltip.emptyWithoutMatraAndAdha: This cell contains a letter without any matra or half letter.

gameMessages.wrongWordLength: The answer is not a {} letter word!
gameMessages.notInDictonary: Your answer {} is not in the Hindi dictionary!

gameResult.share: Click this button to share your score with your friends!

practiceGame.gameOver: You have completed all the words. You have finished this game.
